title: Holy Ground (Taylor's Version)
description:
Holy Ground is part of a trilogy regarding a meaningful relationship in Taylor's life.. So who is this song about? What other songs bring this relationship full circle? And what ridiculous parallels and questions can we gather from this song? Ana, Nick, Lacey and Amy discuss!
What did we miss? What else would you like to hear from us? Let us know!
